dict.acceptation: 运送，运输；运输系统；运输工具；流放；

sent.orig: Air Transportation, Transportation Demand Analysis, Transportation Planning, Transportation Management, Decision Making Analysis, Network Analysis.
sent.trans: 航空运输，运输需求分析，运输规划，运输管理，决策理论分析，路网分析。

sent.orig: Transportation Network restricting on transportation time transportation efficiency will affect the logistics action in Logistics Park.
sent.trans: 交通路网对运输时间、效率等的限制将直接影响到物流园区内的物流活动。

sent.orig: Currently, our business scope is including Transportation, Transportation, Ground Transportation, Warehousing & Packing, and Customs Brokerage.
sent.trans: 目前，中天业务范围包括海运，空运，内陆运输，仓储和包装，以及报关服务。

sent.orig: International transportation service: sea, air, inland transportation, sea multi transportation, and transshipment at the 3rd country.
sent.trans: 国际运输服务：海运、空运、陆运、海空联运，以及第三国中转运输服务。

sent.orig: Automobile passenger transportation station is the important part of the city transportation programming.
sent.trans: 汽车客运站是城市交通规划的重要组成部分。
